sentences.zh: 臣固知還而斬，然得完陛下士三萬人。」

translations.literal: Chen gu zhi huan er zhan, ran de wan bixia shi san wan ren."
translations.idiomatic: Subject firmly knew return and behead, but obtain complete your majesty soldiers three ten thousand people."

sentences.zh: 於是下恢廷尉。

translations.literal: Thereupon sent Hui to judicial court.

sentences.zh: 廷尉當恢逗橈，當斬。

translations.literal: Judicial court judged Hui delayed obstructed, should behead.

sentences.zh: 恢私行千金丞相蚡。

translations.literal: Hui privately sent thousand gold chancellor Fen.

sentences.zh: 蚡不敢言上，而言於太后曰：「王恢首造馬邑事，今不成而誅恢，是為匈奴報仇也。」

translations.literal: Fen bu gan yan shang, er yan yu tai hou yue: "Wang Hui shou zao Ma yi shi, jin bu cheng er zhu Hui, shi wei Xiong nu bao chou ye."
translations.idiomatic: Fen not dared speak emperor, but spoke to empress dowager: "Wang Hui first created Maiyi matter, now not succeed and execute Hui, is for Xiongnu avenge."

sentences.zh: 上朝太后，太后以丞相言告上。

translations.literal: Emperor court empress dowager, empress dowager with chancellor words told emperor.

sentences.zh: 上曰：「首為馬邑事者，恢也，故發天下兵數十萬，從其言，為此。

translations.literal: Shang yue: "Shou wei Ma yi shi zhe, Hui ye, gu fa tian xia bing shu shi wan, cong qi yan, wei ci.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor said: "First for Maiyi matter, Hui, therefore sent realm troops several ten ten thousand, followed his words, for this.

sentences.zh: 且縱單于不可得，恢所部擊其輜重，猶頗可得，以慰士大夫心。

translations.literal: Moreover even chanyu cannot obtain, Hui his command attack their baggage heavy, still considerably can obtain, to comfort scholar officials heart.

sentences.zh: 今不誅恢，無以謝天下。」

translations.literal: Jin bu zhu Hui, wu yi xie tian xia."
translations.idiomatic: Now not execute Hui, nothing to apologize realm."

sentences.zh: 於是恢聞之，乃自殺。

translations.literal: Thereupon Hui heard it, then suicide.

sentences.zh: 安國為人多大略，智足以當世取合，而出於忠厚焉。

translations.literal: Anguo as person much grand strategy, wisdom sufficient to match age obtain harmony, moreover came from loyal generous.

sentences.zh: 貪嗜於財。

translations.literal: Greedy fond of wealth.

sentences.zh: 所推舉皆廉士，賢於己者也。

translations.literal: What recommended all incorruptible scholars, worthy than himself.

sentences.zh: 於梁舉壺遂、臧固、郅他，皆天下名士，士亦以此稱慕之，唯天子以為國器。

translations.literal: In Liang recommended Hu Sui, Zang Gu, Zhi Ta, all realm famous scholars, scholars also with this praised admired him, only emperor considered as state vessel.

sentences.zh: 安國為御史大夫四歲餘，丞相田蚡死，安國行丞相事，奉引墮車蹇。

translations.literal: Anguo became imperial censor four years remainder, chancellor Tian Fen died, Anguo acted chancellor matters, honored pulled carriage lame.

sentences.zh: 天子議置相，欲用安國，使使視之，蹇甚，乃更以平棘侯薛澤為丞相。

translations.literal: Emperor discussed appoint chancellor, wanted use Anguo, sent envoy see him, lame severe, then changed with Pingji marquis Xue Ze as chancellor.

sentences.zh: 安國病免數月，蹇愈，上復以安國為中尉。

translations.literal: Anguo ill dismissed several months, lame cured, emperor again with Anguo as commandants.

sentences.zh: 歲餘，徙為衛尉。

translations.literal: Year remainder, moved became guard wei.

sentences.zh: 車騎將軍衛青擊匈奴，出上谷，破胡蘢城。

translations.literal: Chariot cavalry general Wei Qing attacked Xiongnu, out Shanggu, broke Hu Wei city.

sentences.zh: 將軍李廣為匈奴所得，復失之；

translations.literal: Jiang jun Li Guang wei Xiong nu suo de, fu shi zhi;
translations.idiomatic: General Li Guang by Xiongnu obtained, again lost him;

sentences.zh: 公孫敖大亡卒：皆當斬，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: Gong sun Ao da wang zu: jie dang zhan, shu wei shu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Gongsun Ao greatly lost soldiers: all should behead, redeemed as commoners.

sentences.zh: 明年，匈奴大入邊，殺遼西太守，及入鴈門，所殺略數千人。

translations.literal: Next year, Xiongnu greatly entered border, killed Liaoxi governor, and entered Yanmen, what killed plundered several thousand people.

sentences.zh: 車騎將軍衛青擊之，出鴈門。

translations.literal: Chariot cavalry general Wei Qing attacked them, out Yanmen.

sentences.zh: 衛尉安國為材官將軍，屯於漁陽。

translations.literal: Guard wei Anguo became material official general, garrisoned at Yuyang.

sentences.zh: 安國捕生虜，言匈奴遠去。

translations.literal: Anguo captured living captives, spoke Xiongnu far gone.

sentences.zh: 即上書言方田作時，請且罷軍屯。

translations.literal: Immediately memorial spoke farming work time, requested temporarily dismiss army garrison.

sentences.zh: 罷軍屯月餘，匈奴大入上谷、漁陽。

translations.literal: Dismissed army garrison month remainder, Xiongnu greatly entered Shanggu, Yuyang.

sentences.zh: 安國壁乃有七百餘人，出與戰，不勝，復入壁。

translations.literal: Anguo defensive wall then had seven hundred remainder people, out with battle, not win, again entered wall.

sentences.zh: 匈奴虜略千餘人及畜產而去。

translations.literal: Xiongnu captives plundered thousand remainder people and livestock produce and left.

sentences.zh: 天子聞之，怒，使使責讓安國。

translations.literal: Emperor heard it, angered, sent envoy blamed rebuked Anguo.

sentences.zh: 徒安國益東，屯右北平。

translations.literal: Moved Anguo eastward more, garrisoned Youbeiping.

sentences.zh: 是時匈奴虜言當入東方。

translations.literal: At time Xiongnu captives spoke should enter eastern direction.

sentences.zh: 安國始為御史大夫及護軍，後稍斥疏，下遷；

translations.literal: An guo shi wei yu shi da fu ji hu jun, hou shao chi shu, xia qian;
translations.idiomatic: Anguo began became imperial censor and protect army, later gradually demoted distant, descended demoted;

sentences.zh: 而新幸壯將軍衛青等有功，益貴。

translations.literal: But newly favored vigorous generals Wei Qing etc. had merit, increasingly noble.

sentences.zh: 安國既疏遠，默默也；

translations.literal: An guo ji shu yuan, mo mo ye;
translations.idiomatic: Anguo already distant, silent;

sentences.zh: 將屯又為匈奴所欺，失亡多，甚自愧。

translations.literal: Army garrison moreover by Xiongnu deceived, lost perished many, very self ashamed.

sentences.zh: 幸得罷歸，乃益東徙屯，意忽忽不樂。

translations.literal: Fortunately obtained dismissed return, then increasingly eastward moved garrison, intention despondent not happy.

sentences.zh: 數月，病歐血死。

translations.literal: Several months, ill vomited blood died.

sentences.zh: 安國以元朔二年中卒。

translations.literal: Anguo with Yuanshuo second year middle died.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：余與壺遂定律歷，觀韓長孺之義，壺遂之深中隱厚。

translations.literal: Tai shi gong yue: Yu yu Hu Sui ding lv li, guan Han Chang ru zhi yi, Hu Sui zhi shen zhong yin hou.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Scribe said: I with Hu Sui determined law calendar, observed Han Changru righteousness, Hu Sui deep middle hidden generous.

sentences.zh: 世之言梁多長者，不虛哉！

translations.literal: Shi zhi yan Liang duo zhang zhe, bu xu zai!
translations.idiomatic: World speak Liang many elders, not false!

sentences.zh: 壺遂官至詹事，天子方倚以為漢相，會遂卒。

translations.literal: Hu Sui office reached director of palace affairs, emperor just relied to be Han chancellor, met Sui died.

sentences.zh: 不然，壺遂之內廉行修，斯鞠躬君子也。

translations.literal: Not so, Hu Sui internal incorrupt conduct cultivated, this bowed gentleman.
